sentences.en: To a consumer, the most visible form of e-commerce consists of online ordering.
sentences.cn: 对消费者来说，电子商务最明显的形式就是网上订购。

sentences.en: With the development of e-commerce, shopping online has become increasingly popular.
sentences.cn: 随着电子商务的发展，网上购物越来越受欢迎。

sentences.en: Instead of a physical catalog, e-commerce arranges for catalogs to be visible on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 电子商务准备的是可以在互联网上看的目录，而不是有形的目录。
